loans.use: To buy pieces of wood to sell.

loans.name: Wathek

texts.en:
Wathek is a 30-year-old Iraqi youth client who is married and has a child. Wathek is the sole provider of the family.

Wathek owns a grocery store that sells soft drinks, juices, cheese, dairy products, detergent and snacks. Since childhood, he has helped his father in the same grocery store. He took over this family business in 2009. He has gained good experience in this field and is well known in the surrounding area with an excellent reputation. 

Wathek is requesting a youth loan of $2,400 to renovate his grocery store by repainting both the inside and outside. He wants to grow his business and increase his profits so that he may buy a bigger shop one day and provide more services to his society. His face is blurred in the photo to protect his identity.

loans.use: to renovate his grocery store by repainting both the inside and outside.

loans.name: Rwenkuba Tukwatanise Group

texts.en:
Jenina, 61, is a widowed mother who has grown bananas for over 30 years to feed her small family. To supplement her income, she also sells firewood to her community members. Jenina and her other group members in the Renkuba Tukwatanise Group are located in the Rwenkuba–Mitooma District in western Uganda.  

As one of the group leaders, Jenina has requested a loan to buy fertilizers and mulch for her banana farm and to replenish firewood items for her business. Jenina hopes to make more money to use to expand her business and generate more profit for her children's and grandchildren’s future. The woman standing next to the gentleman to the left has a running loan, but is not a member of this sub group.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers for her banana farm.

loans.name: Chicas Azucar De Panamericana Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “CHICAS AZUCAR DE PANAMERICANA”  iniciará el tercer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Panamericana, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Norah es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: carpintería, elaboración de mantas, tejido de mantas, tejido de chompas, venta de frutas, venta de artefactos.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Norah es integrante, ella indica que hace tres años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una asesora de la institución que fue a visitarme a mi casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de trenzado de mantas; este negocio lo emprendió recientemente, después de haber aprendido la técnica de trenzado de sus amigas, decide emprender su propio espacio de trabajo.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de lana) que adquirirá de las tiendas mayoristas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará a pedido de la clientela. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar pues ella es casada y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “Chicas Azucar de Panamericana” is starting its third loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Panamericana Community Center.  This group consists of eight members and is led by a Board of Directors in which Norah is the president.  The members of this Communal Bank engage in various businesses such as carpentry, producing blankets, knitting blankets, knitting sweaters, selling fruit, and selling appliances.  

This loan will benefit small entrepreneurs such as Sra. Norah.  She says that she joined Pro Mujer three years ago after receiving an invitation from an advisor of the organization who visited her at her house.  Norah currently has a business of weaving blankets that she started recently.  After she learned her weaving techniques from her friends, Norah decided to establish her own work space.  

The loan she is receiving now will be used to increase her capital for buying wool, which she will acquire at the wholesale shops in the city of El Alto.  She will then use the material for making and selling the products that have been ordered by her customers.  Working in this manner enables her to generate income to maintain her household.  Norah is married and has two children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, Norah said that she enjoys the health services.

loans.use: to buy wool.

loans.name: Paulita

texts.en:
Paulita lives in Kinangay Norte, Clarin, Misamis Occidental with her family. Besides planting and harvesting corn, she also has a coconut farm, growing coconuts to sell.  

Paulita successfully repaid her previous loan from Gata Daku MPC, which she used to improve her farm. Recently, she borrowed a loan of 5,000 PHP to pay school tuition for her children. She wants to see her children finish their studies in the future. She plans to use the additional revenue generated to improve the general living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to pay school tuition for her children.

loans.name: Amin

texts.en:
Amin is from Iraq. He is 44 years old, married and has four children. Amin works to provide for his family’s needs and to provide the tuition fees of his four children.

He owns a small shop where he sells perfumes and deodorants. He also has a small collection of women's and children's outfits. He has been in this field since 2008 and has been gradually gaining experience through practicing this business. Amin is well-known in the area with an excellent reputation.

Amin is requesting a loan of $1,500 USD in order to renovate his shop to attract more customers. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so that he may enhance his current financial conditions and provide his family with better life standards.

loans.use: to renovate his shop.

loans.name: Bader

texts.en:
Bader is an Iraq client who is 37 years old, married and has four children. Bader is the sole provider of his family.
 
Bader is a well-known mechanic in the area. He specializes in fixing engine problems related to vehicles. He has been in this field since 2004 and has good experience in what he practices. Now, Bader has an employee hired and has earned the respect of his neighborhood.

Bader is requesting a loan of $3,000 USD. He will use this loan to pay the annual rent of his garage. Bader is an ambitious person. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so that he may provide all the needs of his family with better standards.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent of his garage.

loans.name: Annet

texts.en:
Annet used the previous loan to buy shoes to sell. She is a 33-year-old, hard-working woman with three children, living in Fort Portal, Uganda. She sells second-hand shoes, and with the proceeds, she has been able to pay school fees for her children.

Unpredictable weather changes affect her business since she operates in the open, while her dreams are to move to a sheltered business premises, to buy a plot, and to build a house. Annet is requesting a loan to buy shoes to sell.

loans.use: to buy shoes to sell.

loans.name: Om-Kamal Group

texts.en:
This group is called Om-Kamal. They live in Sana`a, Yemen. 

Dawla is a 35-year-old married woman and has children. She has been working in embroidery for six years. She started her business as a hobby at her home where she embroidered at her leisure. She strives as much as possible to expand her business so that she can improve the living conditions of her family. 

She has a small house where she intends to buy home improvement. She applied for a loan of 50,000 YER (Yemen rials) from AMB to cover the cost of buying furniture to use for her house. She hopes to open an embroidery shop to increase her profit.

loans.use: to cover the cost of buying furniture to use for her house.

loans.name: Alae Al Din

texts.en:
Alae Al Din is 37 years old and lives in Iraq with his wife and two children. He is the family's sole breadwinner and works hard as a blacksmith. 

After working for several years as an employee at a similar blacksmith’s shop, he gained good experience by making doors and windows. In 2002, he established his own business and has gained an excellent reputation in his surrounding area.

Alae Al Din is requesting a loan for $2,100 to buy a motor generator for his shop. He wants to grow his business and increase his profits so that he can provide a bright future for each of his children.

loans.use: to buy a motor generator for his shop.

loans.name: Ime

texts.en: Ime is 28 years old and married with two children. Ime is from Mialen, Clarin, Misamis Occidental in the Philippines. To earn a living, Ime owns and manages her rice farm and at the same time, she is employed at a private company. Her husband is working too.  She joined Gata Daku MPC and she has successfully repaid her previous loans that she used for farm inputs. Ime is requesting a loan of PHP 55,000 to cover the cost of weeding maintenance and to buy fertilizer. Ime has been a member of GDMPC for four years. Her future plan is to renovate her house for better living conditions.

loans.use: to cover the cost of weeding and to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Ziyodullo

texts.en:
Ziyodullo is 27 years old. He is a hardworking man with a great desire to be a successful businessman. His lifetime’s partner is a housewife and they have two non-adult children.
 
He is one of the hardworking businessmen in his town. For more than eight years, he has been busy selling dried fruits. He knows all aspects of his business very well. His experience and skills help him to develop the business and in this way, to improve his living conditions. His wife helps him with the business. He wants to develop the business further but his income is small and he needs your help and mercy.

This is the first loan he is requesting a loan from IMON and he feels deeply grateful for the economic support to achieve his goals. He is asking for a loan of 7,000 Somoni to buy dried fruits to increase his working capital. He awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy dried fruit to sell

loans.name: Kasem

texts.en:
Kasem is 43 years old, married, and has three children. He is from Iraq and is the sole provider in his family. 

Kasem owns a small cafe where people come to relax, drink coffee, and smoke the famous Arabian Hubble Bubble. He has been in this field for more than seven years and established his own business in 2011. Kasem's business grew fast and he now has four employees. He gained an excellent reputation in his surrounding area and is well-known in his neighborhood.
 
Kasem is requesting a loan of $2,400, which he will use to install a second ceiling for his cafe. Kasem is aiming to expand his business and increase his profits so that he can provide his family with better living standards.

loans.use: to install a second ceiling for his cafe

loans.name: Kitab

texts.en:
Kitab is a 40-year-old Iraqi client. He owns a small shop where he sells herbal medicines, creams and oils. He has established his business in 2011 and has much experience in this field. Kitab is the only person with such a profession in the neighborhood, which helped him to gain an excellent reputation and spread his fame all around the surrounding area.

Kitab is requesting a loan of 3,000 USD. He will use this loan to install a rolling shutter and an external ceiling as well as to buy a motorized generator. Kitab is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits to provide more services for his society and better financial conditions for him and his family.

loans.use: to install a rolling shutter and an external ceiling as well as to buy a motor generator

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en: Rosemarie lives in Kinuman Sur, Ozamis City with her family. She is married with 10 children.  She helps to meet her family's needs by working on their farm with her husband. Rosemarie successfully repaid her previous loan from Gata Daku MPC, which she used to expand her farm. Recently, she borrowed a new loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure. She wants to improve the general living conditions of her family in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en: Fatuma appreciates the previous Kiva loan she received that helped her improve her living standards. Besides her fish-selling business, Fatuma operates a beauty salon. She is requesting a loan of KSH 10,000 to purchase braids, shampoo, hair oil and weaves. She joined Yehu to get financial support.

loans.use: to purchase braids, shampoo, hair oil and weaves

loans.name: Sadek

texts.en: Sadek, age 29, is an Iraqi youth client who is married and has two children. Sadek works hard to provide his family's income by himself. He owns a small business and specializes in selling wood planks used for construction purposes. He has been in this field since 2010 and has gained much experience in dealing with clients and selling the best quality of wood. Sadek became well known in the neighborhood and now he has two hired employees. Sadek is applying for a youth loan of 3,000 USD. This loan will be used to increase his lumber inventory. Sadek is aiming to grow more in this field so he is able to educate his children and provide their needs.

loans.use: to increase his lumber inventory

loans.name: Nong Taaba Group

texts.fr:
Mme SYLVIE est responsable du groupe NONG-TAABA. Elle se porte bien.  Mariée, elle est mère de 02 enfants. Le plus âgé a 12ans et le moins âgés à 09 ans.  02 vont à l’école  et  elle a 03 personnes en charge. 
Mme  vend des habits depuis 06ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché de son secteur. Ses clients sont les femmes et hommes  de son quartier. 
Elle veut s’acheter 04 douzaines d’habits pour femmes et 06douzaines pour enfants. 
Elle veut réinvestir ses bénéfices dans son activité. Mme ambitionne acheter une moto et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mrs. Sylvie is the leader of Nong Taaba Group. She's married and the mother of two children. The eldest is twelve years old, the youngest is eight. Both of them attend school. In addition, she has three dependents.

Mrs. Sylvie has been selling clothing for six years. She gets her supplies from a market in her area. Her customers are women and men from her neighborhood.

She wants to buy four dozen sets of clothing for women and six dozen sets for children.

She wants to reinvest her profits in her business. She would like to buy a motorcycle and improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy four dozen clothes for women and six dozen for children.

loans.name: Mahdi

texts.en:
Mahdi is a married youth client from Iraq. He is 22 years old and lives with his parents and his three brothers. Mahdi and his father provide the family income together.

Mahdi is a grocer and owns a small grocery store where he sells canned food, dairy products, juices and detergents. Before establishing his business in 2009, Mahdi used to work as an employee at a grocery store in the neighborhood. Mahdi has much experience in what he practices and is well-known in the surrounding area with an excellent reputation.

Mahdi is requesting a youth loan of 3,000 USD. He will use this loan to install signage and a rolling shutter for his grocery store and to install some new shelves inside. He is aiming to grow his business and enhance his current financial condition so he may provide the best for his family.

loans.use: to install a sign, a rolling shutter and shelves for his grocery store

loans.name: Thon

texts.en: Thon is 57 years old.  She is widowed and resides with three children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia.  She has been working in construction for more than ten years, earning approximately $3 per day.  Her children are employed as construction workers and a garment worker.  They earn about $15 daily.  Due to lack of funds, Thon requests a loan of $300 to purchase zinc to fix her house’s roof. This purchase will help her provide convenient living for her family.  In the future, she would like to run a tailoring shop and build a fence around her house.

loans.use: to purchase zinc to fix her house's roof

loans.name: Bopha

texts.en: Bopha is 22 years old. She is married and resides with a four-year-old child in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been selling pork for more than four years, earning approximately $12 per day. Her husband helps her run the business. In order to improve her business, Bopha is requesting a loan of $700 to raise capital to purchase more pork to sell. By doing so, she would earn more profit to financially support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and rebuild her house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase more pork to sell.

loans.name: Remigio

texts.pt:
Remigio tem 44 anos de idade, é casado e trabalha como segurança há 17 anos. Possui 5 filhos que estudam com as idades:  22, 21, 15,13,10 anos respectivamente, frequentam as seguintes classes: 9, 8 e 4 classes.
Remigio é também negociante e os fundos do empréstimo serao aplicados na compra de recargas de crédito para telemoveis para depois revender. Remigio tem o sonho de construir uma mercearia para venda de produtos alimentares e o principal desafio é de ampliar a sua casa.
texts.en:
Remigio is 44 years old and married. He has been working as a security guard for 17 years. He has five children who study. They're 22, 21, 15, 13 and 10 years old and attend the 9th, 8th and 4th grades.
Remigio is also a trader. The funds from the loan will be used to purchase cell phone recharge credits for re-selling.
Remigio's dream is to build a grocery store in order to seel foodstuffs. His main challenge is enlarging his house.

loans.use: to purchase cell phone recharge credits for re-selling.

loans.name: Marieta

texts.pt:
A Sra. Marieta vive maritalmente e tem 4 filhos e para alem deles vive também com o irmão e sua esposa, ambos desempregados. 
A sua base de sustento é o negócio. Ela tem uma barraca em sua casa onde vende produtos alimentares diversos e bebidas. Para alem do negócio ele faz machambas para aumentar as suas receitas. Ela trabalha com os filhos sendo que de manhã vai a machamba com parte da família deixando o negócio com os filhos.
Ela precisa do empréstimo para comprar produtos de mercearia para revender tais como bebidas e arroz em sacos.
O seu maior sonho é abrir outra barraca numa zona em expansão residencial.
texts.en:
Marieta is married and has four children. Aside from her children she also lives with her brother and his wife, both of whom are unemployed.
Her means of livelihood is her business. She owns a stall in her house where she sells various foodstuffs and beverages. Aside from her business she also works in farming so she can increase her earnings. She works alongside her children. In the mornings she goes to the farm with part of her family and leaves the business for her children to run.
She needs the loan in order to purchase groceries such as beverages and sacks of rice for re-selling.
Her biggest dream is opening another stall in a fast-growing residential area.

loans.use: to purchase groceries such as beverages and sacks of rice for re-selling.

loans.name: Helio

texts.pt:
Helio tem 28 anos de idade, é casado e tem 1 filho sem idade escolar. Ele é operador de máquinas e a sua esposa é negociante. O seu horário de trabalho é das 07:00h às 16:30H. A esposa possui uma banca próximo da sua casa.
O empréstimo será para compra de cimento, ferro, janela e porta para concluir a obra de uma casa de banho que está a fazer em sua casa.
O Helio tem como esperança voltar a estudar, fazer o ensino médio e talvez ingressar no ensino superior. O seu principal desafio é de concluir a sua obra para melhor confortar a sua família.
texts.en:
Helio is 28 years old and married. He has a son who hasn't reached school age. He's a machine operator and his wife is a trader. He works from 7 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. His wife owns a stall near their house.
The loan will be used to purchase cement, iron, a window and a door so he can finish the bathroom that he's building in his house.
Helio hopes to go back to school, finish high school and maybe enter college. His main challenge is finishing the construction work in order to provide more comfort for his family.

loans.use: to purchase cement, iron, a window and a door so he can finish building a bathroom.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.pt:
Senhor Carlos é casado, tem 3 filhos, dos quais 1 frequenta ensino secundário e outros sem idade escolar. É militar ha 23 anos,  vive na casa própria.
Com o dinheiro de empréstimo vai comprar cimento, chapas, varões, para aumentar mais 1 quarto na sua casa. No futuro pretende ingressar no ensino superior, e terminar a construção da sua casa. Vai continuar a fazer empréstimos na HLUVUKU-ADSEMA PARA  lograr seus projectos.
texts.en:
Carlos is married and has three children, one of whom attends high school and the other ones haven't reached school age. He has been a serviceman for over 23 years and lives in a house that he owns.
With the money from the loan he'll purchase cement, metal sheets and rods so he can build another bedroom in his house. In the future he intends to enter college and finish the construction work in his house. He'll keep on getting loans from Hluvuku-Adseman so he can achieve his projects.

loans.use: to purchase cement, metal sheets and rods.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.pt:
Manuel é guarda numa empresa  do ramo agrícola, é casado e tem 5 filhos que que estudam tem na sua responsabilidade  2 netos que vivem tambem com ele.
Com o valor do emprestimo ira comprar tubos, fios Pbc, pagar a mão de obra e formularizar o contracto com electricidade. Com o valor que sobrar  sera para levantar a parte da sala uma vez que a cas onde vive so e composta  por 2 quartos.
Sonhos para o futuro ampliar sua casa com mais 2 quartos.
Pretende terminar o crédito e voltar a socilitar mais créditos para realizar os seus planos.
texts.en:
Manuel is a security guard for an agricultural company. He's married and has five children who study. He's responsible for two grandchildren who also live with him.
With the amount of the loan he'll purchase tubes and wires, pay for labor and formalize a contract for electricity services. With the remaining amount he'll build part of his living room, since the house where he lives only has two bedrooms.
His dream for the future is to enlarge his house with two more bedrooms.
He intends to repay the loan and apply for more loans again so he can accomplish his plans.

loans.use: to purchase tubes and wires, to pay for labor and to formalize a contract for electricity services.

loans.name: Paulo

texts.pt:
O Sr. Paulo de 56 anos de idade, casado e tem 9 filhos dos quais 6 estao a frequentar a escola no ensino primario e secundario, 1 sem idade para frequentar a escola e 2 sao independentes. Ele e Operario Agricola numa empresa de producao de banana.
O presente emprestimo sera aplicado para compra de material de construcao (cimento, blocos, janelas, areia e pagamento de mao-de-obra) para dar continuidade à construção da sua casa.
texts.en:
Paulo, 56 years old, is married and has nine children: two adults, six children in elementary and secondary school, and one child who is not yet of school age. He is an agricultural worker at a banana company.
He will use this loan to purchase construction materials (cement, cinder blocks, and sand) and to pay for labor to continue the construction on his house.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials (cement, cinder blocks, and sand) and to pay for labor to continue the construction on his house.

loans.name: Savoeun

texts.en:
Savoeun sells groceries at home, while her husband is a goldsmith. She lives in a village about twenty kilometers from Phnom Penh City. She is now has one young daughter and one baby daughter who was just born. 

Savoeun is requesting a loan to expand her grocery store by buying more grocery items and she will use the rest of the loan to make additions to her house. 

Photo: Savoeun and her husband.

loans.use: To expand her grocery store by buying more grocery items and to make additions to her house.

loans.name: Sarun

texts.en:
Sarun (in the photo) is now a garment worker. Prior, she was in pig farming business but she quit the business. Her husband has full-time employment. She lives in a village approximately twenty kilometers from Phnom Penh City and has two kids, who are in school.
Sarun is asking for a loan in order to purchase motorbike to get work. She can buy it from her neighbor but she did not pay for it yet. So, she asked for the loan to pay for the purchase.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike to get to work.

loans.name: Bih

texts.en:
Bih is a widow with seven children. She lives with her children in a five-bedroom apartment in Bamenda Mezam Division of the northwest region of Cameroon.  She has faced many challenges in life such as inadequate finance to manage her business, accidents, the death of her family members, sickness that almost took away the life of her last child and problems faced from her husband's family.

With this new loan requested, she will buy more foods including three bags of rice, one bag of beans, twenty litters of vegetable oil, two packets of magi. She will also buy more plates to be able to serve more students at a time because she sells near a high school. 

She holds a positive view of this business succeeding because she has been doing it for a long time and therefore has experience in the business. She has a good business site and has regular customers who buy from her on a daily basis.

With the profit from this business, she will take care with her children's basic needs,as well as pay their school fees, provide three square meals to her family and make provision for her family's health care since she is alone with the responsibilities of bring up her children. She prefers GHAPE loans because of low interest rates, convenient

loans.use: To buy supplies for her restaurant.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a horse in order to run transportation between villages.

loans.name: Yin

texts.en:
Yin is a 23-year-old farmer, residing in a region of Kampong Cham province. She has a common law relationship with her spouse and has a lovely young kid, whom she loves very much. For almost 10 years, she has been involved in growing rice alongside her supportive husband and has never regretted it. Throughout her hardships, she has been able to generate a net income of KHR 40,000 per day for the financial solvency of her family.

Due to the upcoming rainy season, she is in need of farming supplies to apply to her crops in a suitable manner and at the right time. For this reason, she is borrowing a loan to buy fertilizers and pesticides. She, through the loan, hopes to get a high yield of production and re-invest the profit to broaden her agricultural activities.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Ernesto Junior

texts.pt:
O Sr. Ernesto de 28 anos de idade, solteiro e tem uma filha que esta a frequentar a escola ensino primário. Ele e negociante  de produtos da primeira necessidade e bebidas há mais de 3 anos, uma actividade em que está a ser acompanhado por um auxiliar no seu estabelecimento comercial na sua casa.
O presente empréstimo será aplicado para compra de produtos da primeira necessidade como arroz e bebidas para aumentar o volume do seu negocio.
texts.en:
Ernesto, 28 years old, is unmarried and has a daughter in elementary school. He has had a business selling staples and drinks out of his house for more than three years, and he has one employee.
He will use this loan to buy staple goods such as rice and drinks to increase his sales.

loans.use: to buy staples such as rice and drinks to increase his sales.

loans.name: Irene

texts.pt:
Irene é comerciante tem 58 anos de idade, e viúva tem 7 filhos dos quais 1 estuda outros já são maiores de idade.
Com este valor irá comprar peixe, refrescos, para reforcar o seu negocio que faz na sua casa.
Diz que gosta  de trabalhar com a Hluvuku pois tem verificado melhorias no rendimento de sua casa e gostaria de solicitar mais créditos depois deste.
texts.en:
Irene has her own business. She is 58 years old and a widow. She has seven children, one of whom is in school, while the rest are now adults.
She will use this loan to buy fish and soft drinks to strengthen the business she runs out of her house.
She says she likes working with Hluvuku because she has been able to increase her income, and she hopes to request more loans once this one is paid off.

loans.use: to buy fish and soft drinks to build her business.

loans.name: Artur

texts.pt:
Artur é casado, tem 60 anos de idade com 6 filhos dos quais 3 já são maiores de idade e os restantes 3 estudam. Ele é segurança numa empresa privada.
Com o valor do crédito ira comprar cimento, ferro, e blocos para dar continuidade a construção de sua casa que neste momento esta na fase da janela.
Diz que no futuro pretende fazer instalação eléctrica e de água para melhorar as condições de sua família.
Compromete-se a pagar pontualmente nas datas acordadas e voltar a solicitar mais para realizar seu plano.
texts.en:
Artur, 60 years old, is married and the father of six children, three of whom are adults and the rest of whom go to school. He is a security guard at a private company.
He plans to use this loan to buy cement, rebar, and cinder blocks to continue building his house, in which he is currently installing windows.
He says that in the future he hopes to install electricity and running water to improve his family's living conditions.
He is committed to making his loan payments on time so he can request other loans to carry out his plans.

loans.use: to buy cement, rebar, and cinder blocks to continue building his house.

loans.name: Domingos

texts.pt:
Domingos tem  59 anos de idade, é pensionista e secretário numa associação dos antigos combatentes. É  casado e tem 2 filhos que estudam.
Com o empréstimo ira comprar cimento e casquilhos para as janelas  de sua casa.
Diz que seu os planos para o futuro são: vedar seu quintal com um muro e criação de frangos.
Ele compromete se a pagar pontualmente o emprestimo para pedir mais de maneiras a concretizar seu plano.
texts.en:
Domingos is 59 years old. He is retired and is the secretary of a veterans association. He is married and has two children, both of whom are in school.
He will use this loan to buy cement and window frames for his house.
He says that in the future he plans to build a wall around his property and raise chickens.
He is committed to paying off his loan on time so that he can request more resources to fulfill his goals.

loans.use: to buy cement and window frames for his house.

loans.name: Valentim

texts.pt:
Valentim é agente de serviço numa escola de nível secundário. Tem 27 anos de idade, vive maritalmente há 4 anos e tem 2 filhos sem idade escolar. 
Com o empréstimo ira comprar cimento, ferro, areia e pedra para ampliar a sua casa com 1 sala e um quarto pois agora vive só num quarto.
Além de trabalhar na escola tem uma barbearia no mercado local feita de material precário, por isso no futuro pretende  remodelá-la e fazer com material convencional. Não tem trabalhadores mas conta com a ajuda da seu irmão.
Diz que gostaria de honrar com o calendário e que irá pedir mais empréstimos para realizar o plano já traçado.
texts.en:
Valentim works at a secondary school. He is 27 years and has lived with his partner for four years; they have two young children who are not yet in school.
He will use this loan to buy cement, rebar, sand, and stone to expand his one-room house by building a living room and bedroom.
In addition to his work at the school, he also has a barber's stall at the local market built out of low-quality materials. In the future he would like to rebuild it using better materials. He has no employees, but his brother helps him out.
He says that he would like to honor the payment schedule and that he will request further loans so he can pursue the goals he has set for himself.

loans.use: to buy cement, rebar, sand, and stone to expand his one-room house.

loans.name: Xipanga

texts.pt:
Xipanga  é pensionista  do ministério da defesa, tem 61 anos de idade, é casado e pai de 3 filhos, todos estudantes.
Com o valor do empréstimo vai comprar cimento para dar continuidade à construção da sua casa.
Xipanga tem esperança de concluir a sua casa e comprar mais bens para a família.
Os principais  desafios é fazer acabamentos de sua casa e construir um estabelecimento para prestação de serviços.
texts.en:
Xipanga has retired from the ministry of defense. He is 61 years old, married, and the father of three children, all of whom are in school.
He plans to use this loan to buy cement to continue building his house.
Xipanga hopes to finish his house and buy more things for his family.
His greatest challenges are to finish his house and build a shop in which to offer his services.

loans.use: to buy cement to continue building his house.

loans.name: Rui

texts.pt:
Senhor Rui é viuvo, tem 53 anos de idade e tem 4 filhos mas só um é que está na sua responsabilidade. Está cursando nίvel médio  em contabilidade e gestão, é segurança de uma empresa privada e trabalha em turnos, vive na casa própria com o seu filho e netos.
o dinheiro de empréstimo será aplicado na compra de cimento, chapas e aros para dar continuidade à construção da sua casa, a mesma onde habita.
No futuro pretende construir uma dependência para o filho. Vai economizar o salário e fazer mais empréstimos na hluvuku-adsema para realizar os seus projectos.
texts.en:
Rui, 53 years old, is a widower with four children, only one of whom still lives with him. He is studying accounting and management. He works shifts as a security guard at a private company and lives in his own home with his son and grandchildren.
He will use this loan to buy cement, sheet metal, and other materials to continue construction on the house he lives in.
In the future he hopes to build a room for his son. He will be frugal with his salary and take out more loans with Hluvuku-Adsema to carry out his projects.

loans.use: to buy cement, sheet metal, and other materials to continue construction on his house.

loans.name: Blanca Esmeralda

texts.es: La cliente vive en Machala.  Inició el negocio con su esposo ya que el tenía un consultorio jurídico y después empezó a sacar copias.  Trabaja durante el día con un hermano por la mañana y en la tarde trabaja ella sola.  Es casada y su esposo es abogado, tiene 3 hijos mayores de edad.  Necesita el préstamo para la compra de computadoras, impresoras e insumos para su cyber.
texts.en:
This borrower lives in Machala. She started this business with her husband, who already has a law practice. Afterwards, she began providing copying services. The borrower works throughout the day, with her brother in the mornings and by herself in the afternoons. She is married and her husband is a lawyer. They have three grown children.

The borrower needs a loan so that she can buy computers, printers, and supplies for her cybercafé.

loans.use: to buy computers, printers, and supplies for her cybercafé.

loans.name: Richard Daniel

texts.es: El cliente reside en la ciudad de Machala.  Heredó el comedor de su mamá ya que era un negocio familiar que tenía mucho tiempo ya.  Labora por las mañanas, vendiendo desayunos y en la tarde preparando almuerzos.  Es soltero y tiene una hija que estudia en la escuela fiscal.  Por ahora requiere invertir el dinero del préstamo en la compra de una vitrina, un congelador y una cocina industrial para su negocio.
texts.en:
This borrower resides in the city of Machala. He inherited a diner from his mother since this business had already been in the family for a long time. He works in the mornings selling breakfast and in the afternoons preparing lunches. The borrower is single and has a daughter who attends a state school.

For now, he is requesting a loan so that he can invest in the purchase of a display cabinet, a freezer, and an industrial stove for his business.

loans.use: to buy a display cabinet, a freezer, an industrial stove, and supplies for his business.

loans.name: Licinio Orlando

texts.es: El cliente es de la ciudad de Playas.  Empezó hace 6 años cuando tuvo que ir a Posorja por motivo de su situación económica.  Tuvo un dinero guardado, con el que pudo adquirir un carro para dedicarse a esta actividad.  El realiza su trabajo con su hijo de 4 años, quien lamentablemente sufre de una condición especial.  Generalmente labora desde las 6 am hasta las 8 pm.  Es casado y su esposa se dedica a realizar las labores domésticas.  Necesita el crédito para la compra de repuestos y el mantenimiento de su vehículo.
texts.en:
This borrower is from the city of Playas. His story began six years ago when he had to travel to Posorja because of his financial situation. With the money he saved, he was able to buy a car for his business. He conducts his work with his four-year-old son in mind because he unfortunately suffers from a special condition.

The borrower generally works from 6:00 A.M. to 8:00 P.M. He is married and his wife takes care of the household duties. The borrower needs a loan so that he can buy spare parts and pay for the maintenance of his vehicle.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and pay for vehicle maintenance.

loans.name: Rony Dubal

texts.es: El cliente reside en la ciudad de Playas.  Empezó con la venta de bebidas a los 23 años, por motivo de encontrarse desempleado en ese momento.  Actualmente ha mejorado mucho su estatus de vida, gracias al apoyo que ha recibido con los créditos que ha solicitado.  Trabaja en esta actividad solo, luego de culminar su jornada de trabajo los sábados y domingos todo el día hasta las 9 pm.  Es soltero y no tiene hijos.  Por ahora tiene la necesitad del préstamo para comprar bebidas gaseosas para su negocio.
texts.en:
This borrower resides in the city of Playas. He began selling beverages at the age of 23 because he was unemployed at that time. At the moment, his living status has greatly improved thanks to the support of the loans he had requested.

The borrower works at his business alone. After he finishes his full-time job on Saturdays and Sundays, he works the rest of the day until 9:00 P.M. He is single and has no children. For now, he needs a loan in order to buy soft drinks for his business.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks to sell.

loans.name: Robinson Fernando

texts.es: El cliente reside en la ciudad de Playas.  Empezó hace 5 años como transportista urbano y se dedicó por completo a esta actividad por cuestiones de superación personal.  Trabaja las 24 horas del día solo en su camioneta.  Actualmente se encuentra en estado de unión libre y su cónyuge se dedica a las labores del hogar.  Tiene 2 hijos, quienes estudian en la escuela fiscal del sector.  Desea el crédito para invertirlo en la compra de repuestos y el trabajo de pintura necesario para su vehículo.
texts.en:
This borrower resides in the city of Playas. He started out five years ago as a municipal driver, but he decided to devote himself full-time to his business in order to gain a sense of personal achievement. The borrower works alone on-call 24 hours a day with only his truck. He is currently in a common-law relationship and his wife takes care of the household duties. They have two children who attend a state school in the area.

The borrower would like a loan so that he can invest in the purchase of spare parts and to pay for a needed paint job on his vehicle.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and to pay for a paint job on his vehicle.

loans.name: Lilian

texts.es: El cliente es del sector de Fortín en Guayaquil.  Escogió esta actividad porque siempre le ha gustado dedicarse a las ventas y ser independiente.  Trabaja sola desde las 9 am hasta las 6:30 pm.  Es soltera y tiene 4 hijos, quienes ya son mayores de edad.  Necesita el préstamo para comprar blusas, pantalones y camisetas para su venta.
texts.en:
This borrower is from the Fortín sector of Guayaquil. She chose this line of work because she has always enjoyed making sales and being independent. She works alone from 9:00 A.M. to 6:30 P.M. The borrower is single and has four children who are already grown.

She needs a loan in order to buy blouses, trousers, and T-shirts to sell.

loans.use: to buy blouses, trousers, and T-shirts to sell.

loans.name: Mwigai

texts.en:
Mwigai is a 27-year-old married man. He has four children. He describes himself as excellent. 

He operates a barber shop. He has been involved in this business for nine years. His business is located in a good area and his primary customers are working class people. He describes his biggest business challenge as lack of money to boost the business. 

He will use the KES 90,000 loan to buy shaving machines and chairs. His business goal is to own a mega barber shop within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will be excellent in that business. He will use the anticipated profits to open another barber shop.

loans.use: to buy shaving machines and chairs.

loans.name: Awa

texts.fr: Madame Awa est une femme âgée de 48 ans qui habite dans le même quartier que le Guichet. Elle est mariée et mère de 7 enfants dont le plus âgé a 32 ans et le moins âgé  a 6ans. Elle évolue dans le commerce des légumes et a une expérience de plus de 20ans dans son activité. Elle sollicite ce crédit pour acheter des légumes et augmenter son stock de marchandises afin de satisfaire la demande de ses clients. Awa commence sa journée à 7h du matin pour la terminer à 19h. A l'avenir, elle souhaite ouvrir une ferme agricole et diversifier son activité afin de pouvoir améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en: Awa is a 48-year-old woman who lives in the same neighborhood as the bank. She is married and the mother of seven children - the eldest is 32 years old, and the youngest is 6 years old. She works in the vegetable trade and has over 20 years' experience in her business. She is requesting this loan to buy vegetables and increase her merchandise stock to satisfy her customers' requests. Awa starts her day at 7 am and finishes at 7 pm. In the future, she hopes to have a farm and diversify her business in order to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy and resell vegetables

loans.name: Gpf Moussa Bocar Thiam Group

texts.fr: Ceci est un groupement qui rassemble cinq femmes qui  habitent le même village et qui font du commerce de tissus. Elles sont expérimentées car plusieurs d’entre elles ont fait entre 10 et 15ans d’activité. Leur présidente, la dame Aïssata qui a levé la main sur la photo, est âgée de 49 ans, mariée et mère de famille. Avec le crédit qu’elle va recevoir, elle ira acheter des tissus comme les bazins, wax et autres pour revendre sur le marché local car elle possède une cantine. Elle a une expérience de 10 ans dans ce domaine d’activité. Elle ne reste pas les bras croisés car elle participe à la dépense quotidienne de la famille. Puisqu’elle a une clientèle régulière, elle aimerait acquérir un fond stable afin de pouvoir les satisfaire à temps pour cela elle a besoin de l’appui de l’IMCEC.
texts.en:
This is a group of five women who live in the same village and who trade fabrics. They are experienced as several of them have between 10 and 15 years of business experience. Their President, Aïssata, whose hand is raised in the photo, is a 49-year-old married mother. With this loan, she will buy bazin, wax and other fabrics to sell at the local market where she has a canteen and 10 years' experience.

Aïssata does not sit back with her arms crossed, as she participates in the daily expenses of her family. She would like to build a stable financial base so that she can promptly satisfy the demand of her regular customers, and this is why she needs the support of UIMCEC.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics for resale.

loans.name: Mwema

texts.en:
Mwema is a 23-year-old married man. He has one child, who is one and one-half years old. Mwema describes himself as determined. He operates a bakery where he sells cakes, doughnuts, and other goods. He has been involved in this business for two years. His business is located in a favorable place, and his primary customers are local residents. He says his biggest business challenge is a lack of enough money to expand business.

He will use the KES 30,000 loan to buy ingredients for preparing his bakery goods, including cooking oil and wheat flour. His business goal is to increase his supply within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will earn higher returns. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy cooking oil, wheat flour, and other items for preparing cakes and doughnuts

loans.name: Samali

texts.en:
Samali is married with five children, and all of them do go to school. She doesn’t take care of additional family members. 

She has a business of a retail shop and has been in this business for  8 years. She has  applied for a loan of 600,000  Uganda shillings from MCDT SACCO to buy more salt, soap, cooking oil, soft drinks and bread. She generates additional income through selling piped water.  

She works from home and sells at both retail and wholesale seven days out of every week.  Her major business challenges include seasonality and defaulters. 

She is aspiring of owning a wholesale shop and also to build her own house. She resides in a rented house, and the family has access to electricity and piped water.  Her monthly expenses include school fees and rent.

loans.use: to buy more salt, soap, cooking oil, soft drinks and bread.

loans.name: Serigne

texts.fr: Monsieur  Serigne, âgé de 30 ans est marié  et père de 5 enfants dont l’ainé a 10 ans et le cadet 2 ans. Il est commerçant de profession et a acquis une expérience de 10 ans dans ce domaine. Serigne évolue dans l'achat et la vente des prêts à porter Il a besoin de ce montant pour augmenter son stock de marchandises. Il  s’occupe de la dépense quotidienne de son foyer  et veille à l’amélioration de leurs conditions de vie. Serigne commence sa journée à 7h pour la terminer à 20h du soir. A l'avenir il souhaite être le plus grand fournisseur et ca grâce à l'aide de l'imcec
texts.en:
Serigne is a 30-year-old married father with five children. His eldest is 10 years old and his youngest is two years old. He is a merchant with 10 years' experience.

Serigne is growing his business in the purchase and resale of ready-to-wear clothing, and he needs this loan to increase his stock of merchandise. He takes care of his family's daily needs and is responsible for improving their living conditions. Serigne starts his day at 7:00 in the morning and finishes at 8:00 in the evening. With the help of UIMCEC, he wants to become the largest supplier of ready-to-wear clothing.

loans.use: to purchase ready-to-wear clothing for resale to his clients.

loans.name: Doreen

texts.en: Doreen is a single mother of four children, two of whom go to school. She has a pub business and has been in this business for six years. She has applied for a loan of 200,000 Uganda shillings from MCDT-SACCO to buy more crates of beer and soda and jerycans of local gin.  She works from home seven days out of every week. Her major business challenges includes law enforcement officers and defaulters.  She is aspiring to own a fully stocked pub and to build her own house. She resides in a rented house and the family has access to electricity and piped water.  Her monthly expenses include rent and school fees.

loans.use: To buy more beer, soda and local gin.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
Daniel is a 29-year-old married man who has a four-and-a-half-year-old child. He describes himself as a visionary and operates a fuel distribution business where he sells kerosene. He has been involved in this business for 4 years. His primary customers are both retail and wholesale and he describes his biggest business challenge to be the variation of prices.
He will use the KES 104,000 loan to buy another kerosene pump. His business goal is to open another outlet within 5 years. He hopes that in the future he will develop a piece of land. This is his third loan with SMEP DTM; his previous loan of KES 50,000 was repaid successfully.

loans.use: buy another kerosene pump

loans.name: Mercy Marivel

texts.es: La cliente es del sector de Fortín en Guayaquil.  Emperzó tiempo atrás cuando recibía el bono solidario, juntó unos ahorros y luego solicitó un crédito para montar su negocio.  Trabaja sola durante el día.  Es madre soltera y tiene mellizas de 3 años.  Sueña con poder crecer aún más con su negocio y de esa forma llegar a ser la tienda de referencia en la zona donde vive.  Ahora necesita invertir el crédito en abarrotes (arroz, embutidos y carne) para su negocio.
texts.en:
This borrower lives in the Fortín sector of Guayaquil. Her story began some time ago when she received a government subsidy. Along with some of her savings and a loan that she requested sometime later, the borrower was able to open her business. She works alone throughout the day. The borrower is a single mother and has three-year-old twin daughters. She dreams of growing her business even more so that it becomes the most recommended store in her area.

For now, she needs to invest a loan in groceries (rice, sausages, and meat) for her business.

loans.use: to buy groceries for her store.

loans.name: Juan Morales

texts.es: El cliente es de la zona de Fortín en Guayaquil.  Empezó tiempo atrás con esta actividad debido a la falta de empleo de ese momento, por lo que buscó la forma de surgir económicamente.  Su esposa lo ayuda activamente en su labor que la realliza todos los días de 8 am a 5 pm.  No tiene hijos y desea a futuro convertirse en el reciclador referente del sector.  Necesita el crédito para invertirlo en la compra de plástico, cartones y botellas.
texts.en:
The client is from the Fortín area of Guayaquil.  He started with this business activity some time ago due to the lack of employment at the time.  He looked for a way to arise financially.

His wife actively helps him with his work, which he does every day from 8:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m.  He does not have children.

In the future he wishes to become the leading recycler in the area.  He needs the loan to buy plastic, cardboard, and bottles.

loans.use: to buy plastic, cardboard, and bottles.

loans.name: José Albertino

texts.es: El cliente vive en el sector de Fortín en Guayaquil.  Comenzó a realizar esta actividad por la falta de oportunidades de empleo en otras plazas, de al forma, intentó con la construcción y desde entonces le ha ido bien.  Trabaja solo con su jefe, en las obras que les asignan como tarea.  Es casado y su esposa trabaja en casa, haciendo las tareas domésticas.  Tiene 2 hijos que asisten a la escuela fiscal del barrio.  Quisiera en el futuro poder manejar sus propios contactos y contractos para trabajar.  Necesita el dinero del crédito para la compra de herramientas de trabajo, como una pulidora y una cortadora.
texts.en:
The client is from the Fortín area of Guayaquil.  He started with this business activity because of the lack of employment opportunities in other places.  That is why he tried construction, and it has gone well for him ever since.  He works alone with his boss on the jobs they are assigned to work.

He is married, and his wife works at home doing the household chores.  He has two children, and they attend the public school in the neighborhood.  In the future he would like to be able to manage his own work contacts and contracts.  

He needs the loan to buy work tools like a sander and a cutting machine.

loans.use: to buy work tools like a sander and a cutting machine.

loans.name: Francisco Wilmer

texts.es: El cliente es del sector de Fortín en Guayaquil.  Empezó tiempo atrás debido a la falta de oportunidades de empleo.  Trabaja solo de manera ambulante, especialmente durante el día.  Tiene hijas y a veces le ayudan con su labor.  Ellas asisten al colegio fiscal de su zona.  Desearía a futuro poder hacer entregas al por mayor, para grandes empresas.  Ahora necesita el crédito para la compra de víveres para la preparación de alimentos.
texts.en: This borrower is from the Fortin neighborhood of Guayaquil.  He started this business some time ago due to the lack of job opportunities.  He works on his own, selling from place to place, mainly during the day.  He has daughters who occasionally help him with his work.  They attend the local public school.  In the future, he would like to be able to make wholesale deliveries to large companies.  He needs a loan at this time to buy groceries to make food.

loans.use: to buy groceries to make food

loans.name: Alex Antonio

texts.es: El cliente vive en la ciudad de Libertad.  Empezó a vender lecho por el sector y como le fue bien, decidió involucrarse más con el negocio.  Luego compró más mercadería para ampliar su tienda, comprando embutidos y otros.  Trabaja todos los días de la semana y lo hace también con la ayuda de su esposa.  Tiene un hijo menor de edad.  Desea en el futuro poder tener su propio local en el centro de la ciudad.  Ahora requiere el préstamo para la compra de lácteos como leche y yogurt y además mortadela.
texts.en:
This borrower lives in the city of Libertad. He began selling milk in his neighborhood and did very well, so he decided to become more involved in his business. Later on, he bought more merchandise to expand his store. He purchased cured meats and other products. The borrower works every day of the week and has the help of his wife. They have a young child. In the future, he wants to have his own shop in the central part of the city.

For now, the borrower is requesting a loan in order to buy dairy products, such as milk and yogurt, as well as mortadella.

loans.use: to buy milk, yogurt, and mortadella.

loans.name: Martín Adolfo

texts.es: El cliente es de la ciudad de Libertad.  Tiempo atrás decidió montar un comedor y le fue bien, luego de esto quiso tener una actividad paralela que le generara ingresos y se dedicó a la pesca.  Trabaja todos los días de 6 am a 2 pm.  Es casado y su esposa es la encargada de administrar el comedor.  Tiene 2 hijos que estudian en la escuela fiscal del sector.  Desea a futuro, poder mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  Ahora requiere el crédito para invertir en pescado.
texts.en:
The borrower is from the city of Libertad.  Some time ago he decided to set up an eatery and it went well. After this, he wanted to have a parallel activity that generated income, and went into the fish business. He works every day from 6 a.m. to 2 p.m. He is married and his wife looks after the eatery. 

He has two children who attend the area's public school. In the future he wishes to be able to improve his family's quality of life. Now he needs a loan to purchase  fish.

loans.use: To buy fish to sell.

loans.name: Julio Tomás

texts.es: El cliente reside en Libertad.  Empezó el negocio cuando su esposa quien tenía su negocio de peces decidió montar una pequeña tienda, con la cual le ha ido muy bien hasta ahora.  Trabaja todos los días de 7 am a 10 pm, por su cuenta propia.  No tiene hijos por ahora, y a futuro desea mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  Necesita el préstamo para la compra de abarrotes para la tienda, como arroz, azúcar y colas.
texts.en:
This borrower resides in Libertad. He started his business when his wife had her own fish business. He decided to open a small store and it has done very well so far. The borrower works on his own every day from 7:00 A.M. to 10:00 P.M. He has no children for now, so he wants to improve his family’s quality of life in the future.

The borrower needs a loan so that he can buy groceries for his store such as rice, sugar, and colas.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, and colas.

loans.name: Lidia Ruperta

texts.es: La cliente es de la ciudad de Libertad.  Empezó tiempo atrás a vender caramelos en la ventana de su casa y poco a poco fue comprando más productos y pudo montar la tienda.  Es casada y su esposo trabaja como taxista.  No tiene hijos y piensa a futuro, ubicar su local comercial en el centro de la ciudad.  Por ahora necesita el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de arroz, azúcar, confitería y otros abarrotes para su tienda.
texts.en:
This borrower is from the city of Libertad.  Some time ago, she began selling candy from a window in her house.  Gradually she bought more products and was able to open a store.  The borrower is married and her husband works as a taxi driver.  They have no children, but are planning to do so in the future.  

Her business is situated in a commercial location in the center of the city.  For now, she needs a loan so that she can invest in the purchase of rice, sugar, sweets, and other groceries for her store.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, sweets, and other groceries for her store.

loans.name: Sandra Elizabeth

texts.es: El cliente vive en Libertad.  Trabajaba desde hace mucho tiempo en un local vendiendo y poco a poco fue adquiriendo experiencia y finalmente pudo montar su negocio.  Trabaja por su cuenta, en horas fijas y bajo pedidos.  Es soltera y no tiene hijos.  Espera en un futuro poder incrementar su negocio y crecer aún más.  Ahora requiere del dinero para la compra de mercadería: chompas, calentadores.
texts.en:
This borrower lives in Libertad. She worked a long time at a retail shop where she gradually gained experience before finally opening her own business. She works on her own based on a set schedule and the orders that she receives. The borrower is single and has no children. In the future, she hopes to increase her business and grow even more.

For now, she is requesting funds in order to buy merchandise such as sweaters and warm-up suits.

loans.use: to buy winter clothes, such as sweaters and warm-up suits.

loans.name: Flerida Del Carmen

texts.es: La cliente reside en la ciudad de Libertad.  Desde hace 10 años, trabajaba en un salón de belleza, en donde aprendió todo lo necesario para montar después su propio negocio.  Trabaja todo el día, por cuenta propia.  Es casada y tiene tres hijos mayores de edad.  Quiere a futuro llegar a tener un gabinete que sea reconocido en el área donde vive.  Ahora necesita el préstamo para comprar una mesa para manicure y varios insumos para su negocio.
texts.en:
This borrower resides in the city of Libertad. Ten years ago, she worked at a beauty salon where she learned everything she needed to know in order to open her own business. She works every day on her own. The borrower is married and has three grown children. In the future, she would like to have an establishment that is well-known in the area where she lives.

For now, she needs a loan in order to buy a manicure table and various supplies for her business.

loans.use: to buy a manicure table and various supplies for her business.

loans.name: Patricia Yolanda

texts.es: La cliente vive en la ciudad de Libertad.  Al principio inició con la venta de zapatos y cosméticos, luego comenzó a trabajasr con ropa de catálogo.  Trabaja de lunes a domingo de 10 am a 6 pm.  Es soltera y no tiene hijos.  Desearía a futuro poder tener su propio local y también implementar un bazar.  Necesita el crédito para la compra de blusas, camisas y vestidos para su venta.
texts.en:
This borrower lives in the city of Libertad. She started out selling shoes and cosmetics at first, but later she began to sell clothes through catalogs. She works Monday through Sunday from 10:00 A.M. to 6:00 P.M. The borrower is single and has no children. In the future, she wants to have her own shop and also open a bazaar.

She needs a loan in order to buy blouses, shirts, and dresses to sell.

loans.use: to buy blouses, shirts, and dresses to sell.

loans.name: Lida Esperanza

texts.es: La cliente es de la ciudad de Machala.  Comenzó porque una amiga le vendía paquetes de belleza y luego se motivó ella misma para vender y poner mi negocio.  Trabaja generalmente por las tardes, de 3 a 6 pm.  Es soltera y no tiene hijos.  Quisiera poder crecer con su negocio y ampliarlo a futuro.  Necesita el crédito para invertirlo en la compra de bisutería, perfumería y vitrinas para su negocio.
texts.en:
This borrower is from the city of Machala. Her story begins as a result of a friend who sold beauty kits. She was encouraged to do the same, so this led to the opening of her business. She generally works in the afternoons from 3:00 P.M. to 6:00 P.M. The borrower is single and has no children. She wants to grow in her business and expand it in the future.

She needs a loan so that she can invest in the purchase of trinkets, perfumes, and display cases for her business.

loans.use: to buy trinkets, perfumes, and display cases for her business.

loans.name: Melida Betty

texts.es: La cliente es de la ciudad de Libertad.  Empezó este negocio dado que se percató tiempo atrás que en su barrio no existía una tienda de abarrotes.  Trabaja todo el día, por su propia cuenta.  Es soltera y no tiene hijos.  Desea poder crecer mucho más con su negocio en el futuro.  Ahora necesita invertir el dinero del préstamo en productos y abarrotes para su tienda.
texts.en:
This borrower is from the city of Libertad.  She started her business some time ago when she realized that there were no grocery stores that existed in her neighborhood.  She works every day through her own initiative.  The borrower is single and has no children.  She wants to grow her business even more in the future.  

For now, she needs to invest the money from this loan in merchandise and groceries for her store.

loans.use: to buy merchandise and groceries for her store.

loans.name: Tania Del Pilar

texts.es: La cliente es de la ciudad de Libertad.  Empezó cuando estaba muy joven y con su esposo juntos emprendieron en esta actividad que desde el principio les resultó productiva.  Realiza su actividad sola durante el día.  Tiene hijos menores de edad.  Siempre ha tenido la idea de tener la estabilidad económica tendiendo una actividad o trabajo digno.  Necesita el dinero del préstamo para la compra de productos de belleza para su venta.
texts.en:
This borrower is from the city of Libertad. She started out when she was very young. She and her husband established this business together and achieved productive results from the beginning. The borrower works alone at her business throughout the day. She has young children.

The borrower has always had the idea of achieving financial stability by having a business or a decent job. She needs the money from this loan in order to buy beauty products to sell.

loans.use: to buy beauty products to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To build a hay barn

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es:
Manuel ha trabajado con Fundación Alternativa desde hace un año. Piensa que es de las pocas IMF que llegan a todos los rincones de Santo Domingo, tomando en cuenta que donde Manuel reside es un lugar donde no hay buses y solo llega el carro lechero con mucha dificultad. 
Esta actividad que se desarrolla en su familia de generación en generación, le permite llevar a su familia el sustento y brindar a su hijo la educación que necesita.
Ahora solicita un segundo crédito con el que nuevamente adquirirá ganado para criarlo y luego venderlo además de poder producir mayor cantidad de leche. 
Su esposa quien se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar también le apoya en el cuidado del ganado. 
Una vez más Manuel ha aplicado al producto Kiva porque es muy motivante para él que personas de diferentes lugares en el mundo le brinden apoyo.
texts.en:
Manuel has been working with Fundación Alternativa for one year.  He believes that it is one of the few microfinance institutions that has reached all corners of Santo Domingo, which takes into account the place where Manuel lives since there are no buses and only one milk truck can reach his area with great difficulty.
  
His business has been in his family for generations.  This is how he is able to support his family and provide his son with the education he needs.  Manuel is now requesting a second loan because he needs to acquire another cow to raise and sell at a later time.  In addition, he wants to produce a greater quantity of milk.  His wife spends her time with the household duties, but she also helps with taking care of the cows.

Once again, Manuel has applied for a Kiva loan because is he is very excited that people from different parts of the world are willing to help him.

loans.use: to buy another cow.

loans.name: Diana Betty

texts.es: La cliente es de la ciudad de Machala.  Empezó tiempo atrás, haciendo manicure y pedicure puerta a puerta visitando a sus amigas y conocidas.  Realiza su trabajo sola durante el día hasta la tarde.  Es soltera pero tiene un hijo de 7 años que estudia en la escuela fiscal de su área.  Desea a futuro poder crecer con su negocio para convertirlo también en un spa para sus clientes.  Ahora necesita el préstamo para la compra de insumos para gabinete (tintes, tratantes y accesorios).
texts.en:
This borrower is from the city of Machala.  Some time ago, she began offering manicures and pedicures by going door-to-door and visiting her friends and acquaintances.  She works alone during the day and into the evening.  

The borrower is single and has a seven-year-old son who attends a state school in the area.  In the future, she wants to grow her business and convert it into a spa for her customers.  For now she is requesting a loan so that she can buy salon supplies such as dyes, treatments, and accessories.

loans.use: to buy dyes, treatments, and accessories.

loans.name: Beatriz Elena

texts.es: Beatriz tiene 45 años de edad y es madre soltera de tres hijos. Su negocio surgió de la necesidad de generar ingresos para solventar los gastos de su familia, pues toda la carga económica recae sobre ella ya que no cuenta con el apoyo del padre de sus hijos. Su experiencia como comerciante independiente la obtuvo, luego de manejar una tienda que tuvo durante 8 años. Hoy en día posee un almacén de variedades ubicado en la casa donde reside, allí ofrece chocolatería, papelería, cosméticos, accesorios, cremas corporales, entre otros, de esta manera ha logrado obtener recursos durante los últimos 10 meses que lleva de funcionamiento. La cliente es una mujer carismática y humilde, una luchadora incansable que siempre va en busca de mejores oportunidades para sacar adelante a sus hijos. Actualmente solicita el crédito como apoyo para fortalecer su negocio, con el dinero desea comprar activos fijos (fotocopiadora e impresora) con el fin de aumentar su patrimonio y satisfacer la demanda de estos servicios, aprovechando la ventaja de no contar con competidores cercanos. Así pretende mejorar la solvencia económica familiar, fortalecer su negocio, para que le permita brindar a sus hijos una excelente educación y mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Beatriz is 45 years old and a single mother with three children.  Her business emerged out of necessity because she needed to generate income for her family’s expenses.  All of the financial responsibilities fall on her since she receives no support from the father of her children.  Beatriz gained experience as an independent merchant after she managed a shop that she had owned for eight years.  Now she has a variety store in her home where she offers chocolates, stationery, cosmetics, accessories, body crèmes, and other products.  This is how she has been able to generate income within the past 10 months that her business has been in operation.  

Beatriz is a charismatic and humble woman who strives tirelessly to find better opportunities to help her children get ahead.  She is currently requesting a loan so that she can strengthen her business.  With the money she wants to buy fixed assets (a photocopier and a printer) so that she can increase her inventory and satisfy the demand for these services.  Beatriz is also taking advantage of the fact that she has no competitors nearby.  She plans to improve her family’s financial solvency and strengthen her business so that she can provide her children an excellent education and better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a photocopier and a printer so that she can provide additional services.

loans.name: Monica Antonieta

texts.es: La cliente es de la ciudad de Libertad.  Esta actividad la realiza desde hace años atrás, dado que es un negocio que lo ha llevado su familia durante mucho tiempo.  El horario en el que sale a recorrer y vender es de 4 am hasta 6 pm, y lo realiza sola.  Ahora está separada de su esposo pero tiene 2 hijos, uno de 14 y otro de 15 años, quienes estudian en el colegio fiscal del sector.  Necesita el préstamo para la compra de víveres necesarios para la elaboración de bollos.
texts.en:
This borrower is from the city of Libertad.  She has been in this business for years since it has been in her family for a long time.  Her schedule for going out and selling is from 4:00 A.M. to 6:00 P.M.  She works alone.  The borrower is now separated from her husband.  She has two children, ages 14 and 15, who attend a state high school in the area.  

The borrower needs a loan in order to buy the necessary ingredients for making steamed rolls.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Tharith

texts.en: Tharith (in the photo), age 22, is a garment worker. Her husband is hired to sell ice and he gets paid with a fee. Tharith lives in a village about 35 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. She has two young children: one son and one daughter. Tharith is asking for a loan to repair the house (walls) where she lives because they are old and broken.

loans.use: To repair the house (walls) where she lives.

loans.name: Sopheap

texts.en:
Sopheap (in the photo), age 26, is a garment worker. Her husband is a construction worker. She lives in a village near the Mekong River about 30 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. She has two young children: one son and one daughter.

Sopheap hopes to expand her land property, so she decided to apply for a loan to buy neighboring land.

loans.use: to buy neighboring land to expand her property

loans.name: Lap

texts.en:
Lap is 36 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Kampong Speu Province, Cambodia. She has been breeding pigs for more than five years, earning approximately $3 per day. Her husband runs an arc welding business. He makes an income of $25 each day.

In order to improve her husband’s business, Lap is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase metal for her husband to use in his business. This money will help him expand the business and earn more income for the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase metal for her husband to use in his business

loans.name: Thay

texts.en:
Thay (in the photo), age 37, lives in a village near the Mekong River about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. She has two daughters: one attends school and another one is still young.

Thay sells grocery items at home, while her husband is a motor taxi driver. She is asking for a loan to buy a new motorbike for her husband because the old one is breaking, meaning Thay’s husband spends lots of money on repairs.

loans.use: to buy new motorbike for her husband

loans.name: Chantheng

texts.en:
Chantheng (in the photo), age 21, is single. She is a tailor. She lives with her sister and widowed mother about 25 kilometers away from Phnom Penh.

Chantha’s sister is also a tailor. She wants to supplement a new business selling groceries at home, but she does not have capital, so Chantha decided to apply for a loan in order to help her sister with capital. Money from the loan will be used toward building a grocery shop and buy grocery items.

loans.use: to help with capital for her sister to supplement a new business selling groceries

loans.name: Run

texts.en:
Run is 58 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Kampong Speu Province, Cambodia. She has been selling cakes for more than ten years, earning approximately $5 daily. Her husband is a rice farmer who makes an income of $3 each day.

In order to improve her family’s finances, Run is requesting a loan of $1,500 to purchase materials to use for running an automobile painting business. This money will enable her to start a new business and generate more income to financially support the family. In the future, she would like to rebuild her house to make it more comfortable for the family.

loans.use: to purchase materials to use for running automobile painting business

loans.name: Savan

texts.en: Savan is 48 years old. She is married and resides with four children in Kampong Speu Province, Cambodia. She has been selling breakfast food for more than a year, earning approximately $5 per day. Her husband is a water pipe repairman who makes an income of $4 daily. Two of her children are employed as garment workers. They earn about $8 each day. Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Savan is requesting a loan of $1500 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase will help her to save money on her transportation expenses and enable her children to go to work on time. In the future, she would like to expand her business and to help her children earn a higher education.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting.
